title: [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter, VINTAR 3 Prong Grounded Plug with 2 USB and 2 American Outlets, 4 in 1 Outlet Adaptor Dual USB, AC Outlet Adaptor for USA to Italy Uruguay Chile (Type L)
descriptions:
Here is a product listing based on the provided JSON data:

**Product Title:** [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter, VINTAR 3 Prong Grounded Plug with 2 USB and 2 American Outlets, 4 in 1 Outlet Adaptor Dual USB, AC Outlet Adaptor for USA to Italy Uruguay Chile (Type L)

**Product Description:**

Stay connected and powered up on your international travels with our VINTAR 3-Pack Italy Travel Power Adapter! This ultra-light and compact adapter is designed for convenience and safety, featuring a grounded 3-prong plug and 2 USB ports that can charge up to 2.4A.

**Key Features:**

* 4-in-1 outlet adapter with 2 American outlets and 2 USB ports
* Grounded 3-prong plug for safe and secure connections
* Compatible with standard N American 2 or 3-prong flat pin plugs
* Max capacity: 2500W (250V, 10A)
* Dual voltage support: 100V-250V wide voltage device
* Suitable for charging cell phones, tablets, power banks, and other electric products
* Compatible with Italy, Chile, Cuba, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Lybia, San Marino, Syria, Uruguay, and Vatican City
* CE and FCC certified for quality and safety assurance
* 12-month warranty with friendly customer service

**Product Specifications:**

* Dimensions: 2.8 x 2.6 x 2.3 inches
* Weight: Ultra-light and compact
* Plug type: Grounded 3-prong plug
* USB output: Up to 2.4A
* Voltage compatibility: 100V-250V wide voltage device
* Converter: NOT A CONVERTER (devices must support 100V-250V dual voltage)

**What's Included:**

* 3 x Italy Travel Power Adapters

**Order now and stay powered up on your international travels!**

Here is the product listing based on the provided JSON data summaries:

**Product Name:** [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter, VINTAR 3 Prong Grounded Plug with 2 USB and 2 American Outlets, 4 in 1 Outlet Adaptor Dual USB, AC Outlet Adaptor for USA to Italy Uruguay Chile (Type L)

**Product Description:**

Are you planning a trip to Italy, Uruguay, Chile, or other countries that use Type L power sockets? Look no further! Our 3-pack Italy travel power adapter is the perfect solution for your power needs abroad. With its ultra-light and compact design, this adapter is easy to carry and won't take up much space in your luggage.

**Key Features:**

* 4 in 1 outlet adapter with 2 USB ports and 2 American outlets
* Grounded 3 prong plug for safe and secure charging
* Compatible with standard N American 2 or 3 prong flat pin plugs
* Max capacity: 2500W, 250V, 10A
* Dual USB output: up to 2.4A
* Ideal for charging cell phones, tablets, power banks, and other electric products
* Compatible with 10 countries: Italy, Chile, Cuba, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Libya, San Marino, Syria, Uruguay, and Vatican City
* CE and FCC certified for quality assurance
* 12-month warranty and friendly customer service

**Important Notes:**

* This adapter is not a converter, so your devices must support 100V-250V dual voltage. For low-power electronics, this adapter is suitable. However, if your device requires a specific voltage, please check before using this adapter.

**Product Specifications:**

* Dimensions: 2.8 x 2.6 x 2.3 inches (length x width x height)
* Weight: Ultra light and compact
* Voltage compatibility: 100V-250V wide voltage device
* Certifications: CE, FCC
* Warranty: 12 months
* Customer service: Friendly

**What's in the Box:**

* 3 x Italy Travel Power Adapters

Order now and enjoy convenient and safe charging on your next international trip!
